title: Desired name unavailable yet it is available?
body: I want to change my summoner name yet when i type it is says its "unavailable" but when i search if anyone else has it,it doesnt come up with anyone? Whats happening?

replies.body: It's *possible* that there exists an account with the name that was perma-banned which isn't coming up in "standard" searches (for whatever reason), in which case the name would likely be unavailable. You could try submitting a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (I'd recommend using the "General League of Legends question" option) regarding the issue to see if they can shed some light on the situation.
